tree.name: Toumani Camara
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: POR traded Lillard to MIL, and Nurkic/K.Johnson/N.Little to PHX. POR received Holiday/3 1st-rd picks from MIL, and Ayton/Camara from PHX.
tree.note: Belgian forward, 52nd overall pick 2023. Received from Phoenix as part of Lillard mega-trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: Damian Lillard
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 6th overall by Portland in 2012, Weber State guard. Sent to Milwaukee.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jusuf Nurkic
assetsGivenUp.note: Center, acquired from Denver for Mason Plumlee and 2017 second round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Mason Plumlee
assetsGivenUp.note: Duke center, acquired from Brooklyn for Steve Blake and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson draft rights

assetsGivenUp.name: Steve Blake
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran guard, signed as free agent from Golden State

assetsGivenUp.name: 2015 1st Round Pick (#23)
assetsGivenUp.note: Portland's own 2015 1st round pick, used to draft RHJ then traded to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2018 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Portland's own 2018 2nd round pick, sent to Denver with Plumlee for Nurkic

assetsGivenUp.name: Keon Johnson
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard, acquired from Clippers (part of Powell/Covington trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: Norman Powell
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard, acquired from Toronto for Gary Trent Jr. and Rodney Hood

assetsGivenUp.name: Gary Trent Jr.
assetsGivenUp.note: Duke guard, drafted 37th overall by Portland

assetsGivenUp.name: Rodney Hood
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard/forward, acquired from Cleveland for Nik Stauskas, Wade Baldwin IV and two 2nd round picks

assetsGivenUp.note: Guard, signed as free agent by Portland

assetsGivenUp.name: Wade Baldwin IV
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard, signed to standard contract by Portland

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Portland's own 2021 2nd round pick, sent to Cleveland

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Portland's own 2023 2nd round pick, sent to Cleveland
